page.title: 04EWYAS HAROLD VILLAGE
page.content: {Ewyas Harold Village}is small but not as small as some of the villages in Herefordshire with its{population}of nearly{1000.}There are{5 shops}and there are{3 pubs}called The Dog, The Temple and The Red Lion. The school we are in now was built in{1976}and the old school was built in{1843.} We now use the old school for the pre-school playgroup, Adventurers,Brownies and Guides and in the summer holidays we have holiday club. There is a field which we call the playing field where there are some swings, a slide, seesaw and a roundabout.There are football, putting and cricket. The village is also lucky to have a doctors' surgery and a dentist.
